title: The Great Old One
content: Description Blade Ward Cantrip Abjuration Action Inflicts Blade Ward (2)Take only half the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks. Bone Chill Cantrip Necromancy Action Inflicts Chill Touch (2)Prevent the target from healing until your next turn. An undead target receives Disadvantage on Attack Rolls. 18m Eldritch Blast Cantrip Evocation Action 1d10Force Conjure beam(s) of crackling energy.The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level
